session_info.name: WEXA - Invited Oral Presentation, Light Sources and FELs

papers.title: Overview of Seeded FELs and Harmonic Generation
authors: Overview of Seeded FELs and Harmonic Generation High-gain free-electron lasers (FELs) have been a remarkable success as the fourth generation light sources. In the last decade
tremendous progress has been made in both theoretical understandings and successful constructions and operations of large-scale FEL facilities all over the world. To generate fully coherent
have been proposed and experimentally demonstrated in recent years. This paper gives an overview of recent achievements and prospects for future developments in these seeded high-gain FELs.
